snippet.title: Crisis Vrigade 2 Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
This morning Diego Martin, co-founder and developer of Crisis Vrigade posted on twitter:
"We're close to releasing #CrisisVRigade2. Hope next week we can make a more specific announcement. Meanwhile you can take a look at our cinematic trailer. I think it captures the heart of CV2.
#PSVR #VirtualReality #indiegame #Oculus #gamedevelopment  #Steam #AimController"

If there's one thing I like more than action, it's EPIC action. This game is confirmed to support the AIM controller, Move Controllers, and likely the DS4 as well. Stay tuned for more info!


Hardcore Gamer dedicated to following and supporting PSVR Offering Tips, Reviews, Livestreams, Discussions, Walkthroughs, Early Access Gameplay, Developer Interviews, and the latest on everything PSVR!
 
All Games Played on the PS4 Pro

Follow me on Twitter @PSVRUnderground for News, Deals, and PSVR Content from around the Community.

Thank YOU for watching!
